hero.title: Your Partner in Artificial Intelligence Solutions
hero.subtitle: We design and integrate custom AI solutions to propel your business into the future. From intelligent agents to tailored software, we turn your challenges into opportunities.

services_overview.subtitle: Cutting-edge solutions to meet your business needs.
services_overview.agent_desc: Automate your customer service, HR, and more with intelligent and autonomous agents.

services_page.title: Our Services in Detail
services_page.subtitle: Custom solutions to transform your business with artificial intelligence.

ai_agents.banner_subtitle: Delegate tasks, automate processes, and boost efficiency with intelligent AI agents tailored to your business.
ai_agents.title: AI Agent Creation
ai_agents.definition_text: An AI agent is an autonomous program that observes its environment, makes decisions, and performs actions to achieve specific goals. They can automate complex tasks, interact with users, and learn from their experiences.

use_cases.customer_service: A 24/7 chatbot to answer frequently asked questions and resolve basic issues, improving customer satisfaction.
use_cases.hr: A virtual assistant to screen resumes, schedule interviews, and answer candidate questions, speeding up the recruitment process.
use_cases.education: A personalized virtual tutor that adapts to each student's learning pace and offers tailored exercises.
use_cases.finance: An automated financial advisor that analyzes markets, suggests investment strategies, and manages portfolios.

ai_agents.tech: AI, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Machine Learning.

ai_integration.banner_title: Seamlessly Integrate AI into Your Workflow
ai_integration.banner_subtitle: Empower your existing systems with the intelligence of AI. We make the transition smooth and effective.
ai_integration.title: AI Integration Support
ai_integration.section_intro_title: A Smooth Transition to Artificial Intelligence
ai_integration.description: We guide you in integrating artificial intelligence into your existing processes, from strategy to implementation, to maximize your return on investment.

process_steps.audit: Audit of your needs and existing infrastructure.
process_steps.development: Development or integration of custom AI solutions.
process_steps.training: Training your teams for successful adoption.
process_steps.maintenance: Ongoing support and maintenance to ensure performance.

ai_integration.target_audience: From SMEs to large corporations, we adapt our approach to your industry and digital maturity.

faq_items.question: How long does an AI integration project take?
faq_items.answer: The duration varies depending on the project's complexity, from a few weeks for a pilot to several months for a large-scale integration. We define a precise timeline after the audit phase.

faq_items.question: How do you ensure data privacy?
faq_items.answer: Security and confidentiality are our priorities. We comply with current regulations (like GDPR) and implement strict protocols to protect your data at every stage.

software_development.banner_subtitle: From concept to launch, we develop robust, AI-powered software solutions that drive growth and innovation.
software_development.title: Custom Software Development
software_development.description: We create robust and scalable web, mobile, and SaaS platforms, integrating AI to provide smart features and a unique user experience.

faq_items.question: Do you work with agile methodologies?
faq_items.answer: Yes, we favor agile approaches like Scrum to ensure flexibility, transparency, and close collaboration with our clients throughout the project.

faq_items.question: Do you provide maintenance after launch?
faq_items.answer: Absolutely. We offer maintenance and support contracts to ensure the proper functioning, security, and evolution of your software after its production release.

projects.title: AI-Powered E-commerce Platform

chatbots.title: Intelligent Chatbots Creation
chatbots.intro_text: Transform your customer service with AI-powered chatbots that understand context, learn from every interaction, and provide personalized responses 24/7.

advantages.title: 24/7 Availability
advantages.description: Your customers get instant answers at any time, even outside business hours.

advantages.title: Cost Reduction
advantages.description: Reduce customer support costs by up to 70% while improving service quality.

advantages.title: Advanced Personalization
advantages.description: Every interaction is tailored to the customer's profile and history for a unique experience.

advantages.title: Unlimited Scalability
advantages.description: Handle thousands of simultaneous conversations without quality degradation.

ai_benefits.ai: Understands intent and context of messages
Capable of handling nuanced multi-turn discussions
Real-time adaptation based on user profile

chatbots.integrations_text: Our chatbots seamlessly integrate with your existing systems for a smooth and unified experience.

navigator.title: ICXI Navigators
navigator.description: Powerful AI-based tool to quickly assess the maturity of your Customer Experience (CX) and Employee Experience (EX). Get verified analyses, personalized recommendations and a clear roadmap for improvement.

audit.title: CX/EX Audit and Improvement Strategies
audit.description: Objectively assess and optimize your customer experience and employee well-being performance through ICXI's audit and consulting frameworks.

global.title: Elevate your customer service with TISSE Certification
global.description: Become a global reference. Implement the International Service Excellence Standard (TISSE) for measurable results and lasting customer loyalty.

why_tiss.title: Why TISSE in DRC?
why_tiss.subtitle: Why TISSE is Essential for Your Success in DRC?

alignment.title: International Alignment
alignment.description: Recognized Quality, Worldwide. The TISSE standard aligns your service with global best practices, particularly those inspired by ISO 9001. This guarantees unquestionable credibility for your business in DRC, strengthening investor confidence and opening doors to new international opportunities.

credibility.title: Credibility & Structure
credibility.description: In DRC, where customer service training frameworks are limited, TISSE offers a strategic advantage. It provides a reliable structure and concrete tools to assess, train, and improve service quality, allowing companies to distinguish themselves through professionalism and sustainable excellence.

results.title: Measurable Results
results.description: TISSE transforms good intentions into measurable performance. Its rigorous framework gives you the KPIs and tools necessary to quantify the impact of service improvement on customer retention and revenue growth. You thus drive your decisions with reliable data, making customer service a strategic and profitable investment.

cta_audit.title: Ready to Improve Your Customer Service?
cta_audit.description: Contact us today for a free audit of your customer service and discover how TISSE can transform your business.

cta_cert_company.title: Certify Your Company
cta_cert_company.description: Increase customer satisfaction and improve your internal processes through our certification standards.

partners.title: Our Main Partners
partners.description: DRC Pioneer Partners relies on a network of internationally recognized partners to guarantee the excellence and credibility of our services in DRC.

icxi.description: Global organization based in Dubai, leader in CX/EX standards

pretoria.description: Partner for Customer Experience Chair and training

process.title: Our Audit Process
process.description: Discover how we proceed to offer you a quality, methodical audit adapted to your specific needs.

step1.title: Request & Consultation
step1.description: We analyze your needs and define together the objectives of the audit.

step2.title: Preparation & Planning
step2.description: We prepare the audit in detail and plan the interventions.

step3.title: Audit Implementation
step3.description: Our experts conduct the on-site audit according to the defined methodology.

step4.title: Analysis & Report
step4.description: We analyze the results and write a detailed report.
